alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 23 at 3:57PM AKST until December 25 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds have decreased some today, but are expected to become strong again by early Saturday and remain strong into Sunday.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys
